content: growing up a fun favorite summer dessert was a no-bake chocolate eclair cake with layers of graham crackers and vanilla pudding it wasn t necessarily a culinary masterpiece but it was always a treat sweet and simple eclair cake is a little knitting treat in two colors of fingering weight cashmere-silk yarn build up layers of stripes in an easy stitch pattern for a cowl that will nestle softly around your neck **yarn** miss babs sojourn 65% cashmere 35% silk 200 yd/1 8 oz 183 m / 50 g skeins one skein each of two colors shown in coastal fog color a and gibson girl color b or approximately 200 yards/180 meters of each of two colors of fingering weight yarn **finished measurements** circumference 20 /50 cm height 14½ /36 cm **needles** us 3 3 25 mm circular needles 16 /40 cm long or size to obtain gauge **gauge** unblocked 34 stitches and 40 rounds = 4 /10 cm over stitch pattern blocked 32 stitches and 38 rounds = 4 /10 cm over stitch pattern gauge is not crucial for this project but will affect yardage and finished size if different from above **notions** stitch marker tapestry needle
